# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a button with an automatic label that describes the subscription option and starts a subscribe interaction when someone selects the button.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency init(_ option: SubscriptionStoreControlStyleConfiguration.Option)
```

## Discussion

You receive [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SubscriptionStoreControlStyleConfiguration/Option] values to initialize the subscribe button from the [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/SubscriptionStoreControlStyle/makeBody(configuration:)] method of your custom subscription store control style.
